content:
600 
 
DIRECT ENTRY  UTME  
    a) Bachelor’s  degree  in  relevant 
 science programme.   
b) HND credit or equivalent in Animal Health or 
Animal Production Technology.   
c) All  candidates  must  have  the 
 UTME requirements.  
(ix) UDU accepts ND/HND credit in relevant programmes 
plus 'O' level credit passes in Chemistry, Biology,   
Mathematics and Physics.  
(x) UNN requires either ‘A’ level passes or equivalents in 
Chemistry, Biology and Physics in addition to the UTME 
requirements.  
  
UTME  
(i) IBADAN requires five (5) or six (6) 'O' level credit passes 
to include English. Language, Mathematics, Chemistry, 
Physics, Biology and any other relevant subject.  
(ii) MAKURDI accepts Agricultural Science in lieu of Biology.  
(iii) UDU accepts Agricultural Science and Health Science.  
  
  
UTME  SUBJECTS  
(i)  ABU and UDU accept Physics or Mathematics.  
  
  
  
  
  
  
  
  
SCIENCES  
FACULTY/SCHOOL/COLLEGE OF SCIENCE  
(B.Sc. & B. Tech Programmes)
